TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract Geometry extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.IFormattable
Public MustInherit Class Geometry Inherits Animatable Implements IFormattable
public ref class Geometry abstract : System::Windows::Media::Animation::Animatable, IFormattable

summary.span: 衍生自這個抽象基底類別的類別會定義幾何圖案。

span.span: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.

summary.span: 物件可用來裁剪、叫用測試及轉譯 2D 圖形資料。

span.span: objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相較於圖形的幾何Geometry Compared to Shape 類別具有， ，和其他屬性呈現以及其衍生的類別沒有。The class has a , , and other rendering properties that and its derived classes lack. 類別是，並因此參與配置系統，其衍生的類別可以當做支援任何項目的內容子系。The class is a and therefore participates in the layout system; its derived classes can be used as the content of any element that supports children. 類別，相反地，只要定義之幾何的圖形，並無法呈現其本身。The class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of a shape, and cannot render itself. 其簡化，因為它有廣泛的使用。Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses. **可凍結的功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別提供數個特殊功能：可以宣告物件，因為在多個物件，變成唯讀，以改善之間共用效能考量，複製，而且進行安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需有關所提供的不同功能物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

para.span: 這個類別是抽象的雖然不公開可延伸。

span.span: Although this class is abstract, it is not publicly extensible.

summary.span: 取得 ，它指定 與軸對齊的週框方塊。

span.span: Gets a that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of the .
The axis-aligned bounding box of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會考量可能加筆觸的區域。This property does not take into account the area potentially added by a stroke.

summary.span: 建立這個 的可修改複製，製作這個物件值的深層複製。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of the , making deep copies of the object's values.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性將仍為 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

Public Function CloneCurrentValue () As Geometry
public: System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ CloneCurrentValue();

summary.span: 建立 物件的可修改複製品，並在過程中建立物件目前值的深層複本。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of the object, making deep copies of the object's current values.

summary.span: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性將仍為 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 結合兩個 物件。

span.span: Combines two objects.

.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry Combine(class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry1, class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry2, valuetype System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode mode, class System.Windows.Media.Transform transform) cil managed

public: static System::Windows::Media::PathGeometry ^ Combine(System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ geometry1, System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ geometry2, System::Windows::Media::GeometryCombineMode mode, System::Windows::Media::Transform ^ transform);

param.name: geometry1
param.span: 要結合的第一個幾何。

span.span: The first geometry to combine.

param.name: geometry2
param.span: 要結合的第二個幾何。

span.span: The second geometry to combine.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定幾何的結合方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the geometries are combined.

param.name: transform
param.span: 要套用至結合後之幾何的轉換，或為 。

span.span: A transformation to apply to the combined geometry, or .

summary.span: 使用指定的 結合兩個幾何，然後將指定的轉換套用至產生的幾何。

span.span: Combines the two geometries using the specified and applies the specified transform to the resulting geometry.

returns.span: 結合後的幾何。

span.span: The combined geometry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用預設容錯因數 (所描述屬性) 在結合幾何。This method uses the default tolerance factor (described by the property) when combining geometries. 若要指定您自己的容錯因數，請使用方法。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the method. 某些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點中此多邊形近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用時，應該牽涉到仔細思考執行等位，因為可能會很耗費 CPU 資源。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大部分情況下，或效果更好。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用時，才任何則適用下列步驟：Use only when any of the following apply: - 幾何作業不是等位。The geometric operation is not a union. - 其中一個幾何已值和幾何是自我交集 (也就是實際上會影響結果)。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 時間不是問題，但是空間 （例如，如果幾何是建立一次，再進行快取）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 一般而言，會產生較小的輸出，比。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 將產生幾何圖案或路徑動畫中使用和未提供所需的外框。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry Combine (System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry1, System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry2, System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode mode, System.Windows.Media.Transform transform, double tolerance, System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType type);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry Combine(class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry1, class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry2, valuetype System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode mode, class System.Windows.Media.Transform transform, float64 tolerance, valuetype System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType type) cil managed

public: static System::Windows::Media::PathGeometry ^ Combine(System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ geometry1, System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ geometry2, System::Windows::Media::GeometryCombineMode mode, System::Windows::Media::Transform ^ transform, double tolerance, System::Windows::Media::ToleranceType type);

param.name: geometry1
param.span: 要結合的第一個幾何。

span.span: The first geometry to combine.

param.name: geometry2
param.span: 要結合的第二個幾何。

span.span: The second geometry to combine.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定幾何的結合方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the geometries are combined.

param.name: transform
param.span: 要套用至結合後之幾何的轉換，或為 。

span.span: A transformation to apply to the combined geometry, or .

param.name: tolerance
param.span: 在幾何多邊形近似法中，點之間的距離上限。

span.span: The maximum bounds on the distance between points in the polygonal approximation of the geometries.

param.span: 值越小，產生的結果越精確，但執行過程也會比較慢。

span.span: Smaller values produce more accurate results but cause slower execution.

param.span: 如果 tolerance 小於 .000001，則會改用 .000001。

span.span: If tolerance is less than .000001, .000001 is used instead.

param.name: type
param.span: 其中一個 值，這個值會指定容錯因數為絕對值或相對於幾何區域的值。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether the tolerance factor is an absolute value or relative to the area of the geometry.

summary.span: 使用指定的 和容錯因數結合兩個幾何，然後將指定的轉換套用至產生的幾何。

span.span: Combines the two geometries using the specified and tolerance factor, and applies the specified transform to the resulting geometry.

returns.span: 結合後的幾何。

span.span: The combined geometry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點中此多邊形近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用時，應該牽涉到仔細思考執行等位，因為可能會很耗費 CPU 資源。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大部分情況下，或效果更好。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用時，才任何則適用下列步驟：Use only when any of the following apply: - 幾何作業不是等位。The geometric operation is not a union. - 其中一個幾何已值和幾何是自我交集 (也就是實際上會影響結果)。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 時間不是問題，但是空間 （例如，如果幾何是建立一次，再進行快取）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 一般而言，會產生較小的輸出，比。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 將產生幾何圖案或路徑動畫中使用和未提供所需的外框。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點中此多邊形近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設容錯因數 (所指定屬性)，用於決定指定的點是否位於幾何筆劃。The default tolerance factor (specified by the property) is used when determining whether the specified point is located in the geometry's stroke. 若要指定您自己的容錯因數，請使用多載。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the overload. 某些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點中此多邊形近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

summary.span: 在指定的邊際誤差下，判斷指定的 是否包含於筆劃中，而這個筆劃是將指定的 套用至幾何後而產生。

span.span: Determines whether the specified is contained in the stroke produced by applying the specified to the geometry, given the specified margin of error.

returns.span: 如果在指定的容錯因數下，將指定的 套用至幾何後而建立的筆劃包含指定的點，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the stroke created by applying the specified to the geometry contains the specified point, given the specified tolerance factor; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點中此多邊形近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值描述所指定幾何與目前幾何筆劃的交集。

span.span: Returns a value that describes the intersection between the specified geometry and the current geometry's stroke.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設容錯因數 (由屬性)，用於決定指定的幾何是否位於目前的幾何筆劃。The default tolerance factor (defined by the property) is used when determining whether the specified geometry is located in the current geometry's stroke. 若要指定您自己的容錯因數，請使用方法。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the method. 某些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點中此多邊形近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

summary.span: 取得或設定套用至 的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的物件沒有轉換的值，這個方法會傳回身分識別轉換。This method returns the identity transformation if the current object has no transformation value. 否則，它會傳回套用至目前的物件。Otherwise, it returns the applied to the current object. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，將套用至物件。The following example shows how to use the property to apply a to a object. 此範例會使用由三個建立複合的圖形物件，然後再旋轉 45 度的幾何使用屬性。The example uses a to create a composite shape from three objects and then rotates the geometry 45 degrees by using the property.
